text:
The addition of sequence is a new dimension to the function being approximated. Instead of
mapping inputs to outputs alone, the network is capable of learning a mapping function for the
inputs over time to an output.
Long Short-Term Memory (LSTM) is able to solve many time series tasks unsolvable
by feedforward networks using Ô¨Åxed size time windows.
